Title: Silverlight Flickr Slideshow
Description: A Silverlight 3 project that displays a user's flickr photostream in a 3D animated slideshow.
HomeWiki:
3D Flickr Slideshow

Utitlizing some of the new 3D effects in Silverlight 3 we put together this slideshow for flickr photos.


Configuration

You can add this to a web page and configure it with the following parameters in the Silverlight object tag:
  • <param name="background" value="ColorHexValue" />
  • <param name="initparams" value="flickrusername=ID,flickrapikey=key,flickrapi_secret=secret" />
